title: 5br/2ba ►REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR FLAT!

posting_body: TO VIEW THIS HOME:

KEY DETAILS:
☑ Bedrooms: 5 Bedrooms
☑ Bathrooms: 2 Bathrooms
☑ Property Type: Flat
☑ Pets Policy: Pets Welcome
☑ Laundry: Washer and Dryer in unit
☑ Walk Score: 93 - Transit Score: 82 - Bike Score:
DESCRIPTION:
☑ REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR FLAT IN A PRIVATE TWO-UNIT BUILDING!
☑ Victorian architecture, with eleven-foot ceilings in prime Noe Valley
☑ Living and dining area, with desirable open floor plan and VIEWS
☑ Hardwood (Pergo) floors throughout the house
☑ Remodeled gas kitchen, with granite counter-tops and all stainless appliances
☑ Two remodeled, tiled baths
☑ Five bedrooms with generous closet spaces
☑ In-unit washer and dryer
☑ Newer interior paint
☑ Newer, five exterior color paint
☑ Double pane windows and blinds
☑ Recessed custom lighting throughout the home
☑ Telephone jacks and cable hookup in every room
☑ Bike racks
☑ Optional one-car garage parking possibly available for an extra fee - easy street parking
LOCATION:
This renovated home, a full-floor flat, is situated in one of the city's most delightful neighborhoods: The fashionable and sunny Noe Valley.
Near the border of trendy Inner Mission.
At 24th Street, you will find great coffeehouses, bars, restaurants, and shops, all within a short walk from your new home.
A commuter's dream.
The financial district is approximately ten minutes away.
It is a five-minute drive to 280 or 101 freeways to quickly commute to the valley.
The Bart station is at 24th and Mission Street, and public transportation is everywhere.
Only blocks away from most Tech Shuttle stops.
Walk Score: 93 - Transit Score: 82 - Bike Score:
LEASE TERMS:
Clean credit.
First-month rent and a security deposit of one month's rent.
The lease is for one year.
The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.
Thank you for reading this posting.
If you would like to schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting.
